amendment.description: Amendment makes a variety of technical corrections in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-498 to correct a variety of technical errors in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 421 - 0 (Roll no. 310).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Skelton.
